p: The age at which, on the basis of the fitted von Bertalanffy growth equation, individuals attained a predicted length equal to the minimum legal length of 250 mm for retention (MLL) in Western Australia, subsequently referred to as “age at 250 mm,” was calculated. These calculations were undertaken for females and males in each of the six estuaries sampled in 2013–15 and in the four of those estuaries sampled in 1993–96.
